quest.name: Pilfering Pots from the Pantry
journal:
Muna Vanu hopes your strength and guile can save his tribe from the risk of starvation.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.

The Gundu's stockpiles of food grow scarcer by the day, while the Vundu larders swell to bursting with supplies. As his people come to terms with the imminent threat of starvation, he bids you slink into the Vundu camp and steal away with four of their pots of food.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
You slip into the Vundu village and abscond with four potfuls of food. Return to Muna Vanu with your takings.

Ecstatic that his tribe is no longer faced with the grim threat of starvation, Muna Vanu explains the reasons for their lack of food and the Vundu's abundance of it. Now that the Gundu have been forced from the verdant land they once called home, they have nowhere to catch food, while the Vundu hunt and gather at their leisure. With only so much food to go around, and all of it in Vundu larders, the Gundu may have to help themselves to their enemy's supplies for the time being.
objectives: Deliver the pots to Muna Vanu.

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Forename approaches, strong as typhoon that wrenches full-grown trees from bedrock. Our tribe wishes to borrow herhis strength.

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Gundu food supplies dwindle. But Ok' Vundu stocks grow fat like their wives. Surely Vundu not notice some few missing pots. Please gather food for us from their larders. Without them, Gundu may not survive next season.

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: They store everything in pots. Bring back four of them, so tribe does not go hungry.

dialogue.name: GUARDVANU02174
dialogue.text: (-Vundu Warrior-)Netherling steals Vundu food! Stop herhim!

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Does netherling return with Vundu pots?

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Many thanks, Forename. SheHe truly has gift for stealth, stealing into camp like silent evening breeze. Now, let us see what fat Vundu chief feasts on...

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Ohoho! Dried leeches! They look delicious as wriggling, writhing worms, fresh-plucked from soil after heavy rains.

dialogue.name: MUNAVANU
dialogue.text: Vundu claim that soil now─that land...but only after stealing it from Gundu! With no lands in which to hunt, we have no choice but to levy our share from their takings─by force, if we must. Muna Vanu fears Gundu ask Forename for help again in future.
